aka: Igraem zombi, ili zhizn posle bitv
Let's play zombies, or life after battles
this_title: Играем зомби, или жизнь после битв
trans_title: Igraem zombi, ili zhizn posle bitv
Let's play zombies, or life after battles
introduction: “Playing Zombies, or Life After Battles” is a unique bi-movie of its era and probably the first Russian zombie horror. According to the plot, a vengeful spirit zombifies the acting troupe and sends obedient victims into battle with the witch.Add. information: For almost 30 years, this film was not only lost, but also completely forgotten. No footage, posters, or information about the plot have survived. In the year of release, only a few saw the film; it was never released in wide release.
chinese_title: Играем зомби, или жизнь после битв
